entry.title: GMA NEWS COVID-19 Bulletin: UST-Legazpi grad tops 2019 Bar exams

media:group.media:title: GMA NEWS COVID-19 Bulletin: UST-Legazpi grad tops 2019 Bar exams
media:group.media:description:
A graduate of the University of Santo Tomas-Legazpi topped the 2019 Bar exams, earning a rating of 91.0490%. A total of 2,103 candidates passed the examinations, representing 27.36% of the 7,685 examinees who completed the licensure test last November, according to Senior Associate Justice Estela Perlas-Bernabe, the 2019 Bar chair.

entry.title: GMA NEWS COVID-19 Bulletin: Tondo 1 to be placed under hard lockdown this weekend

media:group.media:title: GMA NEWS COVID-19 Bulletin: Tondo 1 to be placed under hard lockdown this weekend
media:group.media:description:
The Manila government will impose a hard lockdown in Tondo District 1 over the weekend. Tondo District 1 is composed of 136 barangays with a population of around half a million.
